titles.title: CHATS Act of 2022
CHATS Act of 2022
Combating Harmful Actions with Transparency on Social Act of 2022
To direct the Attorney General to modify the uniform crime reporting program to include data on internet platforms used in connection with criminal offenses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
Combating Harmful Actions with Transparency on Social Act of 2022 or the CHATS Act of 2022
This bill directs the Department of Justice to modify the Uniform Crime Reporting Program in the Federal Bureau of Investigation to include data on any internet platform used in connection with criminal offenses.
